author: abroekhuis
msg: Added a log service and writer. Updated dependency manager for usage with apr. Added basic log command to the shell (which now depends on the log_service).

author: elecharny
msg: o Factorised the Store.destroy() method into a common method in the AbstractStore class
o Removed the useless rename/move methods which take no Entry parameter in Store

author: rjung
msg: Allow to specify module specific custom linker flags
Use APR_ADDTO instead of APR_SETVAR or direct
This is especially useful when building mod_lua
or mod_deflate against a lua resp. libz which
One can add "-R ..." to MOD_LUA_LDADD and

author: abroekhuis
msg: Updated framework to support service factories
